titleStmt.title: Vindiciæ pædo-baptismi, or, A confirmation of an argument lately emitted for infants baptism in a letter to a reverend divine of the Church of England / by R.B. ...
titleStmt.author: Burthogge, Richard, 1638?-ca. 1700.

notesStmt.note: "Books printed for, and sold by Tho. Simmons at the Prince's Arms in Ludgate-street": p. 80-84.
